column1:
Read the task next 
 to your controller. 
 Press START to begin the task. 
 
 Press STOP to finish the task.  
 Walk on the appearing 
 red area to continue.

We selected Touch Grab. 
 
 Press START to begin the task. 
 
 Press STOP to finish the task.  
 Walk on the appearing 
 red area to continue.

We selected Wand Grab. 
  
 Press START to begin the task. 
 
 Press STOP to finish the task.  
 Walk on the appearing 
 red area to continue.

We selected Extendable Ray. 
  
  Press START to begin the task. 
 
 Press STOP to finish the task.  
 Walk on the appearing 
 red area to continue.

We selected Proximity Grab. 
 
 Press START to begin the task. 
 
 Press STOP to finish the task.  
 Walk on the appearing 
 red area to continue.

We selected Raycast. 
 
 Press START to begin the task. 
 
 Press STOP to finish the task.  
 Thanks for visiting our supermarket!
